title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: There are multiple redraws occurring during text change with word wrap in StyledText, resulting in inefficient performance.
EB: This issue should be resolved so that there is at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line during text change with word wrap.
SR: To reproduce the issue, add the following line to the StyledText's performPaint method: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
